listitem.para: Panagiotis Cheilaris, SandeepKumar Dey, Maria Gabrani, and Evanthia Papadopoulou. Implementing the L segment Voronoi diagram in CGAL and an application in VLSI pattern analysis. In Proc. 4th International Congress on Mathematical Software (ICMS), pages 198205, 2014.

Evanthia Papadopoulou and D.T. Lee. The L Voronoi diagram of segments and VLSI applications. International Journal of Computational Geometry and Applications, 11(5):503528, 2001.
